verbs.description: A Donald Trump impersonator [V: was] told to leave a hospitality tent at the U.S. Open shortly after greeting Andrew “ Beef ” Johnston .

[ARG0: A Donald Trump impersonator] was told to [V: leave] [ARG1: a hospitality tent at the U.S. Open] [ARGM-TMP: shortly after greeting Andrew “ Beef ” Johnston] .
[ARG0: A Donald Trump impersonator] was told to leave a hospitality tent at the U.S. Open shortly after [V: greeting] [ARG1: Andrew “ Beef ” Johnston] .
